amendment.description: To fully fund the Paul and Sheila Wellstone Center for Community Building.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2193 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2193 proposed by Senator Dayton to Amendment SA 2150. (consideration: CR S14936-14937; text: CR S14936) To fully fund the Paul and Sheila Wellstone Center for Community Building.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2193 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2193 proposed by Senator Dayton to Amendment SA 2150.
